page.title: 02FENDRAYTON
page.content: {Fendrayton},an old Norman village stands opposite the{A604}.It has no estate and has mainly old houses which have been modernised or had modern extentions.Most of the houses are detatched but a few arn't.There are loads of{green houses}which grow lettuce,tomatoes,peppers and carrots maybe more.Outside{Rose Cottage}there is a pump.It was made in{1853. That makes it 132 year old. Before{1936}it had a population of {100,today it has a population of 470. A stream runs through the village which is the main drain and has a small bridge going over the stream. Oak cottage is one of the oldest house built in the{14th}century.The school has about{42 pupils.
